# Find the slope of f(x) = x^2 at x = 3

### Create the expression

```{r}
fx <- expression(x^2)
```

### Find the derivative with respect to x

```{r}
df_dx <- D(expr = fx, name = "x")
df_dx
```

### Find the slope at X = 3

```{r}
x <- 3
eval(df_dx)
```

##### Find the slope of P(a) = 2(3a+2)^4 - 5 at a = 1.2
```{r}
Pa <- expression(2*(3*a+2)^4 - 5)
dP_da <- D(expr = Pa, name = "a")
dP_da

a <- 1.2
eval(dP_da)

```
